name: Sasa
short_description:
Sasa is a set of extensions to the .NET framework organized in logical, often standalone assemblies.
Sasa: no dependencies
 * tuples
 * IEnumerable extensions
 * safe events
 * numeric extensions
 * Option and lazy types
 * string extensions
Sasa.Binary: -
 * low-level bit-twiddling functions
 * portable BinaryReader/Writer
Sasa.Collections: Sasa, Sasa.Binary
 * purely functional collections, ie. list, dictionary, queue, set, etc.
Sasa.Mime: -
 * media types and file extensions
Sasa.Numerics: -
 * statistical and numerical functions
Sasa.Net: Sasa, Sasa.Collections
 * full MIME message parsing
 * POP3 client
 * Rfc822 header parsing
Sasa.Concurrency: Sasa
 * software transactional memory
 * most lightweight reader/writer locks
Sasa.Parsing: Sasa
 * extensible Pratt parser
Sasa.Dynamics: Sasa
 * type-safe reflection
Sasa.Linq: -
 * LINQ expression visitors and query providers

...and much more!
summary: Sasa is a collection of organized extensions to the .NET framework.
